what_is_curator_ai_para: Curator AI is a tool to always be up to date with you newsletters.
why_use_curator_ai_title: Why should I use Curator AI ?
why_use_curator_ai_para: It will greatly improve you time.
how_curator_ai_works_para: Curator AI is powered mainly by the OpenAI API. All the configuration can be made through mails.
